column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S at the Northern Split:
column4: The right lane is expected to be blocked for several hours at the bridge over I-64 due to a semi that went off the roadway.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S at the Northern Split:
column4: Expect long delays between Iron Works Pike (Exit 120) and the northern split.
Outer loop New Circle Rd just prior to Nicholasville Rd
column5: Three vehicles reportedly involved.  The outer loop is shutdown and traffic is slowed on the inner loop.

column4: Old Frankfort Pike at S Yarnallton Pike
column5: One vehicle is on its side.  The roadway is shutdown due to a downed pole and wires.
